resources.string:
The Optimum-Fuel-Predictor app is based on a Machine Learning model which predicts the optimum fuel for a given flight. "
""
"The app provides an interface to fill in the flight data and pass it to the ML model through an API. "
""
"The ML model then predicts the optimum fuel based on the given flight data and sends back the result in a response.

1. Fill in the values of the flight parameters. "
"2. Tap on the "Predict" button. "
"3. If the result shows "Error", make sure that you are connected to the internet. "
"4. "Reset" button will clear the previously entered flight data. "
"5. Some default entries are also provided in the app.
